revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=Hardkernel |model=ODROID-GO |revision=Super (GO3) |asin=B0985Y1FW2 |manuf_country=Korea |is_manuf=Yes |price=80 |est_release_date=01/2021 |pcb_id=R-R-HKL-ODROID-GO3 |type=portable game console |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB Female Type-C |cpu1_brand=Rockchip |cpu1_model=RK3326 |cpu1_cspeed=1.3 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=XTX Tech |fla1_model=XT25F128B |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K256M16LY-107:N |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL |eth_none=true |addl_chips=PMIC w/ Integrated CODEC;Rockchip;RK817;;1;,,, USB Power Distribution Switch;First Silicon;FC9516A;;1;,,, 4Î© High Speed Low Voltage 4:1 Multiplexer;SGMicro;SGM48780;;1; |flags=MicroSD Card slot, LCD Display, Audio out (3.5mm), speaker, Li-Po battery connector, I2C, GPIO, power switch }} {{TagLine|ODROID-GO Super}} :[https://www.hardkernel.com/shop/odroid-go-super-dim-gray/ Product page] "HARDKERNEL", "ODROID-GO3 REV 1.0" and "20200923" are silkscreened on board top. :"R-R-HKL-ODROID-GO3" and "Made in Korea" are silkscreened on board bottom. {{See also|ODROID#Models}} ===Links=== *[https://wiki.odroid.com/odroid_go_super/start ''ODROID GO Super'' on '''ODROID''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/12/22/odroid-go-super-ubuntu-portable-gaming-console-gets-a-large-5-inch-display/ ''ODROID-GO Super - Ubuntu portable gaming console'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://liliputing.com/2021/01/odroid-go-super-is-an-80-ubuntu-powered-handheld-game-system.html ''ODROID-GO Super - Ubuntu-powered handheld game system'' on '''Liliputing'''] ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3326 @1.3GHz :SoC: Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A35) :GPU: ''Mali-G31 MP2'' *Storage: 16MB (SPI NOR) flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Memory: 1GB (DDR3L) SDRAM *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports *GPIO: 1x 10-pin port *Power Source: 3.7V/4000mAh Li-Polymer battery :recharge by 5V/1.5A via USB Type-C ==Images== ---- File:ODROID GO-Super Top.jpeg|Board Top File:ODROID GO-Super Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
